Question: Which songs from the movie *Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap* feature contributions from the same lyricists or vocalists?
Options:
A. bbuddah hoga terra baap
B. haal-e-dil
C. go meera go
D. All of the above

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the songs from *Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap*?
Options:
A. Amitabh Bachchan provided vocals for 'Go Meera Go'.
B. Amitabh Bachchan sang the title track 'Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap'.
C. Vishal Dadlani composed the music for 'Go Meera Go'.
D. An acapella version of the title track was performed by Amitabh Bachchan.
Answer: Amitabh Bachchan provided vocals for 'Go Meera Go' and An acapella version of the title track was performed by Amitabh Bachchan.

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the songs from 'Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap'?
Options:
A. a) 'Go Meera Go' features vocals by Amitabh Bachchan.
B. b) 'Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap' has a dub step version.
C. c) Amitabh Bachchan provided vocals for both 'Go Meera Go' and 'Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap'.
D. d) Vishal Dadlani composed the music for 'Go Meera Go'.
Answer: a) 'Go Meera Go' features vocals by Amitabh Bachchan., b) 'Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap' has a dub step version., c) Amitabh Bachchan provided vocals for both 'Go Meera Go' and 'Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap.'

Options:

D. All of the above
